mapper.update: update review r JOIN payment_status p ON r.ipayment = p.ipayment SET r.contents = '' , r.rating = 0 WHERE r.ireview = #{ireview} AND p.istatus = #{istatus}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ireview) FROM review WHERE iuser = #{iuser} and ipayment = #{ipayment}
SELECT P.iuser FROM product P JOIN product_payment PA ON P.iproduct = PA.iproduct WHERE PA.ipayment = #{ipayment}

SELECT COUNT(R.ireview) as countIre, U.rating from product P JOIN product_payment PP ON P.iproduct = PP.iproduct JOIN review R ON R.ipayment = PP.ipayment JOIN user U ON U.iuser = P.iuser AND R.rating IS NOT NULL and R.rating > 0 WHERE P.iuser = #{iuser}
